description: We believe that providing good healthcare includes caring for the emotions and spirit. Our spiritual care staff serves you and your loved ones, whether you're dealing with an illness or coping with grief or loss, to provide spiritual and emotional support.
cleaned_text: A Staff For The Spirit Spiritual care services at CHI St. Alexius Health can help you find faith and hope when you or a loved one is coping with illness. We believe that providing good healthcare includes caring for the emotions and spirit. Our spiritual care staff serves you and your loved ones, whether you're dealing with an illness or coping with grief or loss, to provide spiritual and emotional support.
